<<< body.txt
date: Fri, 25 Feb 2022 17:50:31 +0000
message-id: <%s>
mime-version: 1.0
content-type: text/plain; charset="utf-8"
content-transfer-encoding: quoted-printable

this is a body text

<<< body.html
date: Fri, 25 Feb 2022 17:50:31 +0000
message-id: <%s>
mime-version: 1.0
content-type: text/html; charset="utf-8"
content-transfer-encoding: quoted-printable

<p>this is an HTML body</p>
